"Blender in the Classroom" - Creating interactive educational content using Blender for use in classrooms to help students visualize complex concepts.
"Blender-Based Art Therapy" - Using Blender to create 3D models of patients' emotions and thoughts to aid in art therapy sessions.
"Blender-Generated Fashion Design" - Using Blender to design and create 3D models of clothing and accessories for fashion designers.
"Blender-Powered Virtual Interior Design" - Using Blender to create 3D models of rooms and furniture to help homeowners visualize and plan their home decor.

"Blender-Based Virtual Reality Training" - Creating 3D models and simulations using Blender to provide immersive and interactive training experiences for various industries, such as healthcare and manufacturing.
